Text: No not upgrade to 3.1.3 for jailbreakers!

Yes I agree with Jeroenz0r
Do not update to 3.1.3
Your jail broken Ipod will lose it's jailbreak and you won't be able to Jailbreak it. Especially if on a 3rd Generation.

The only question i have is: Why is it a .exe? Yes, I know it's a SFX archive...but you made it even bigger...
.exe File->249'850'224 bytes
.ipsw File->249'780'497 bytes
I don't get it...
i dont understand how to do it
you might want to change the file extension to .ipsw ... it's saved as .exe and itunes won't recognize it so you can restore your iPod.
